mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_g_reserve ( reserve_no, course_no, email, golf_no, course_name, reserve_time, golf_time, golf_date, golf_status, greenpee ) VALUES ( #{reserve_no}, #{course_no}, #{email}, #{golf_no}, #{course_name}, #{reserve_time, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{golf_time, jdbcType=TIME}, #{golf_date, jdbcType=DATE}, 1, #{greenpee} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_g_course SET golf_no = #{golf_no}, course_name=#{course_name}, greenpee=#{greenpee}, golf_time=#{golf_time}, golf_date=#{golf_date},golf_status=#{golf_status} WHERE course_no=#{course_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from tbl_g_reserve where email = #{email} and golf_status = 1
mapper.update: update tbl_g_reserve set golf_status = 2, cancelTime = now() where reserve_no = #{reserve_no}
update tbl_g_course set golf_status = 0 where course_no = #{course_no}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS getDayCount FROM tbl_g_reserve WHERE email = #{email} AND DATE(reserve_time) = DATE(NOW())
